attributes.action: call for a general election and vote of no confidence in the Tory-Liberal coalition  governmentgovernment
attributes.additional_details:
100,000 to 1 million + signatures needed
 We the people of the UK hereby demand a general election .
The reasons:
The government has constantly targeted the poor.
With the bedroom tax and now charges for the NHS while bailing out banks whose board of directors still get huge bonus'
The government has targeted the sick and needy destroying many thousands of lives.All while the rich get tax cuts.The constant cuts in spending on the NHS and welfare system.
The MP’s are legally claiming £400 per month on food. The basic annual salary for an MP from 1 April 2014 is £67,060.
They have kept the troops in Iraq and Afghanistan.
in a pointless war that has cost the taxpayer and destroyed countless innocent lives in those countries.also needlessly endangering the lives of service men and women .There are many other reasons.
All adding up to just one conclusion.
We the people of the Uk should now decide to force a general election .the coalition only has their own interests at heart.
